attributes.action: Stop basing students' financial support on financial background.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As a student, you are an adult and independant from your parents, so why does the amount of financial support you are given depend on how much money your parents have? Not all middle-class students' parents have money to dish out.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
